remarks: An image set of a countable set is countable, using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Mar-2017.)
statement:
mptctf.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
abrexctf $p |- ( A ~<_ _om -> { y | E. x e. A y = B } ~<_ _om ) $.
$d A y $.
$d B y $.
$d x y $.
